sentence.Network_en: He is a gluttonous and lazy guy.
He is a selfish, gluttonous and lazy person.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个自私、贪婪又懒惰的人。

sentence.Network_en: Wanting to eat or drink more than one can reasonably gluttonous.
sentence.Network_cn: 对吃喝的要求超过了一个人合理的需求.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 贪字的解释--... ... 贪占〖 graft〗 贪嘴〖 begreedyforfood;gluttonous〗 贪恋〖 hatetoleave;bereluctanttopartwith;clingto〗.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... glut 吃饱>饥饿 gluttonous 贪吃的>节制的 grandeur 庄严>轻佻的.
日志 - 小小竹排 - PCHOME博客 ... 42.不依不饶 take off the gloves to 43.贪吃 gluttonous 44.很乖 as good as gold.
饮食类词汇　 - 豆丁网 ... 贪嘴 greed 馋嘴 gluttonous 营养,营养物 nutrition.

list.abs: You glutton !, 你这个贪吃鬼!
wanting to eat or drink more than one can reasonably gluttonous .对吃喝的要求超过了一个人合理的需求。
glutton　贪食者glutton fat　猎脂gluttonize　吃得过度；大吃大喝；狼吞虎咽.
lǎotāo[gluttonous person] 贪吃之人盖聚物之夭美,以养吾之老饕。――苏轼《老饕赋》

entry.tran: 贪吃的；食量大的；贪心的；不知足的
entry.def: If you think that someone eats too much and is greedy, you can say they are gluttonous .

means.word_mean: 1. given to excess in consumption of especially food or drink;

sentences.sentence: "a gluttonous appetite for food and praise and pleasure"

auth_sentence.content: Why hand the City of Manchester Stadium from needy athletics to gluttonous football?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why hand the City of Manchester Stadium from needy athletics to gluttonous football?

auth_sentence.content: Crumbs and a ring of milky white round his mouth betrayed the gluttonous boy.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Crumbs and a ring of milky white round his mouth betrayed the gluttonous boy.

auth_sentence.content: Philip the Prudent, as he grew older...seemed to become more gluttonous of work.
